short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LoyalTV allows you to display your Twitch subscriber badges on your Twitter/X profile and all your tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üèÜ Show off your loyalty
Display your subscriber badges on your Twitter/X profile for all your friends and followers to see.

üí¨ Interact with your favorite Twitch streamers
Display the badges of your favorite streamers when interacting with them on Twitter/X.

üöÄ Promote your favorite Twitch communities
When other users click on your badges it will take them to your favorite Twitch streams.
